rows.name: Anarchic
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; chaotic only; conflicts with lawful/axiomatic/holy/unholy

rows.name: Anarchic
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; chaotic only; conflicts with lawful/axiomatic/holy/unholy

rows.name: Axiomatic
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; lawful only; conflicts with chaotic/anarchic/holy/unholy

rows.name: Axiomatic
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; lawful only; conflicts with chaotic/anarchic/holy/unholy

rows.name: Bane
rows.stacking_rules: Choose creature type/subtype at creation; applies to that foe

rows.name: Bane
rows.stacking_rules: Choose creature type/subtype at creation; applies to that foe

rows.name: Bane
rows.stacking_rules: Choose creature type/subtype at creation; applies to that foe

rows.name: Brilliant energy
rows.stacking_rules: Negates armor/natural armor; no effect vs constructs/undead/objects; cannot be on ammunition

rows.name: Dancing
rows.stacking_rules: Weapon can fight on its own briefly; melee only

rows.name: Defending
rows.stacking_rules: Can shift enhancement to AC as a dodge bonus; melee only

rows.name: Distance
rows.stacking_rules: Range increment ×2; ranged only

rows.name: Disruption
rows.stacking_rules: Bludgeoning only; destroys undead on failed save

rows.name: Flaming
rows.stacking_rules: Adds fire damage; melee or ammunition (use separate ammo row if needed)

rows.name: Flaming
rows.stacking_rules: Adds fire damage to ranged attacks; also valid for ammunition

rows.name: Flaming burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Flaming (includes it); reroll if Flaming already present when randomly generating

rows.name: Flaming burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Flaming (includes it); ranged only; reroll duplicate

rows.name: Frost
rows.stacking_rules: Adds cold damage; melee or ammunition (use separate ammo row if needed)

rows.name: Frost
rows.stacking_rules: Adds cold damage to ranged attacks; also valid for ammunition

rows.name: Icy burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Frost (includes it); reroll duplicate

rows.name: Icy burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Frost (includes it); reroll duplicate

rows.name: Ghost touch
rows.stacking_rules: Fully effective vs incorporeal; melee only

rows.name: Ghost touch
rows.stacking_rules: Fully effective vs incorporeal; ranged only

rows.name: Holy
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; good only; conflicts with unholy/anarchic/axiomatic

rows.name: Holy
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; good only; conflicts with unholy/anarchic/axiomatic

rows.name: Unholy
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; evil only; conflicts with holy/anarchic/axiomatic

rows.name: Unholy
rows.stacking_rules: Alignment-gated; evil only; conflicts with holy/anarchic/axiomatic

rows.name: Keen
rows.stacking_rules: Slashing or piercing melee only; does not stack with Improved Critical

rows.name: Ki focus
rows.stacking_rules: Allows use of ki strike–like effects; melee only

rows.name: Merciful
rows.stacking_rules: Converts to nonlethal and adds damage; toggle as command

rows.name: Merciful
rows.stacking_rules: Converts to nonlethal and adds damage; ranged

rows.name: Mighty cleaving
rows.stacking_rules: Grants one extra Cleave attempt per round; melee only

rows.name: Returning
rows.stacking_rules: Thrown weapons only; returns to wielder

rows.name: Seeking
rows.stacking_rules: Ignores concealment miss chance (non-total); ranged only

rows.name: Shock
rows.stacking_rules: Adds electricity damage; melee or ammunition (use separate ammo row if needed)

rows.name: Shock
rows.stacking_rules: Adds electricity damage to ranged attacks; also valid for ammunition

rows.name: Shocking burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Shock (includes it); reroll duplicate

rows.name: Shocking burst
rows.stacking_rules: Supersets Shock (includes it); reroll duplicate

rows.name: Spell storing
rows.stacking_rules: Holds and delivers a spell (up to 3rd) on hit; melee only

rows.name: Speed
rows.stacking_rules: Grants an extra attack when making a full attack; melee

rows.name: Thundering
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical, adds sonic damage and may deafen

rows.name: Throwing
rows.stacking_rules: Allows melee weapon to be thrown (10 ft. increment unless noted)

rows.name: Vicious
rows.stacking_rules: Extra damage to target and to wielder

rows.name: Vorpal
rows.stacking_rules: Slashing only; decapitation on crit; cannot apply to ranged/ammo

rows.name: Wounding
rows.stacking_rules: Deals bleed (Con damage) on hit; melee only

rows.name: Acidic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as Corrosive; on crit deals extra acid (x2 1d10, x3 2d10, x4 3d10). Burst works even if Corrosive not activated. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Arcane Might
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: sacrifice an arcane prepared spell/slot to add its level to the bow's next damage roll this turn.

rows.name: Aquan
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of fire-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs fire subtype. Fire-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Aquatic
rows.stacking_rules: No penalties for using the weapon underwater (as freedom of movement for weapon use).

rows.name: Auran
rows.stacking_rules: Overcomes DR of earth-subtype creatures; +2d6 damage vs earth subtype. Earth-subtype wielders gain 1 negative level while wielded (can’t be removed while held). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Banishing
rows.stacking_rules: Free action on hit vs extraplanar creature (26 HD or fewer): banish (Will DC 20 negates). +2 DC for each alignment/material trait the weapon has that matches the target’s DR requirement. 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Berserker
rows.stacking_rules: While raging, weapon deals +1d8 damage on each successful attack.

rows.name: Binding
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action: your next successful hit before end of turn applies dimensional anchor for 10 minutes. 2/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Blessed
rows.stacking_rules: Counts as good-aligned for DR (continuous). 3/day swift: auto-confirm all crit threats vs evil foes for 1 round (as bless weapon). Doesn’t stack for extra benefit with other crit-confirm/keen/vorpal effects.

rows.name: Blindsighted
rows.stacking_rules: Std action to activate: wielder gains blindsight 30 ft for 1 minute; negated by silence. 3/day.

rows.name: Bloodfeeding
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit on a living creature grants 1 blood point (max 10; store 1 hour). On a hit, free action to spend up to 5 points for +2 damage per point; you don’t gain a point from that same strike.

rows.name: Bloodstone
rows.stacking_rules: As spell storing but only vampiric touch; any stored spell is automatically Empowered. Holds only one spell.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Empower Spell

rows.name: Blurstrike
rows.stacking_rules: Swift: for 1 round, target is treated as flat-footed against your first attack with this weapon. No effect vs blindsight users or uncanny dodge. 10/day.

rows.name: Brash
rows.stacking_rules: If you rage while wielding: rage lasts +3 rounds; while raging you are immune to fear.

rows.name: Brutal Surge
rows.stacking_rules: After a successful melee hit, swift action to bull rush target using your stats; if two-handed, +2 on opposed Str check. You don’t move with target; movement provokes AoOs from others only. Uses/day = 1 + your Con bonus; once used, no other creature can use it until next day.

rows.name: Bodyfeeder
rows.stacking_rules: On a crit vs living target, gain temp HP equal to half the crit’s damage; lasts up to 1 minute; doesn’t stack with itself or other sources.
rows.required_spells: vampiric touch or claws of the vampire (EPH 84)

rows.name: Changeling
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command, 1/round: change between spear/shortspear/longspear of your size; also alter cosmetic appearance (materials/decoration) only.

rows.name: Chargebreaker
rows.stacking_rules: Any charging creature hit must make DC 14 Fort save or fall prone.

rows.name: Charging
rows.stacking_rules: While mounted, deal +2d6 damage on a successful charge attack.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Spirited Charge

rows.name: Collision
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit deals +5 damage. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Consumptive
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to sheath weapon in negative energy (harmless to wielder); persists until commanded off; each hit vs living deals +1d8 damage. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Corrosive
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to sheath weapon in acid (harmless to wielder); persists until commanded off; each hit deals +1d6 acid. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.
rows.required_spells: acid fog OR acid storm (SC 7) OR Melf's acid arrow OR storm of vengeance

rows.name: Cursespewing
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit, target is cursed for 1 minute: –4 to attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks (not cumulative with itself).

rows.name: Deadly Precision
rows.stacking_rules: Deals +1d6 damage on successful sneak attack or sudden strike. No benefit without those class features; does not increase if you have both.

rows.name: Defensive Surge
rows.stacking_rules: After a successful melee attack in a round you used Combat Expertise or fought defensively, swift command to gain +2 AC until your next turn. Uses/day = 1 + your Int bonus; once used, no other creature can activate until next day.

rows.name: Desiccating
rows.stacking_rules: Each hit deals +1d4 damage to living; +1d8 vs plants and elementals with the water subtype. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Desiccating Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as Desiccating. On a critical hit, deals extra damage by crit multiplier (x2 1d8; x3 2d8; x4 3d8); damage is doubled vs plants or water-subtype elementals. Also fatigues the target for 8 hours or until it drinks ~1 gallon of water. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Disarming
rows.stacking_rules: +2 bonus on disarm attempts; you can’t be disarmed of this weapon.

rows.name: Dislocator
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: your next hit before end of turn teleports the target up to 10 ft in any direction (Will DC 17 negates); can’t place into occupied space. 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Dislocator, Great
rows.stacking_rules: As Dislocator, but teleport distance up to 30 ft (Will DC 20 negates).

rows.name: Dispelling
rows.stacking_rules: On hit, free command to apply targeted dispel magic to the struck creature/object. 3/day.

rows.name: Dispelling, Greater
rows.stacking_rules: As Dispelling, but applies targeted greater dispel magic. 3/day.

rows.name: Divine Wrath
rows.stacking_rules: Swift mental: expend a turn undead attempt to charge the weapon for 1 round; if your next hit is against an undead, it deals +1d6 damage per point of your Cha bonus (minimum +1d6).
rows.required_spells: searing light; requires turn undead and good alignment

rows.name: Domineering
rows.stacking_rules: Creature hit is shaken for 1 minute (Will DC 16 negates). Doesn’t stack with itself or other fear effects.

rows.name: Doom Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit, target becomes shaken (no save) for 5 rounds, even if normally immune to crit extra damage. Doesn’t stack with itself or other fear effects.

rows.name: Dragondoom
rows.stacking_rules: Up to 3/day as a swift command, declare a smite vs a Large or larger dragon before the attack roll; on hit add +1d6 damage per size category above Medium (Large +1d6; Huge +2d6; Gargantuan +3d6; Colossal +4d6). Miss or non-dragon wastes the smite.

rows.name: Dragonhunter
rows.stacking_rules: On hit vs a dragon, target takes 1 Str damage. Critical multiplier increases by 1 against dragons (e.g., longbow x4 vs dragons). Effects that alter threatening/confirming criticals (e.g., keen edge, bless weapon) don’t function on a weapon with this property.

rows.name: Eager
rows.stacking_rules: Can be drawn as a free action. While wielded: +2 initiative; +2 damage during the surprise round and the first round of combat.

rows.name: Energy Aura
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire; each hit deals +1d6 of the chosen type until reactivated to change it. Harmless to wielder. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.
rows.required_spells: chill metal; flame blade; Melf's acid arrow; shocking grasp

rows.name: Energy Surge
rows.costing: +1 bonus (Synergy; requires Corrosive, Flaming, Frost, or Shock)
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as the prerequisite energy property. On a successful melee hit, swift command to deal +3d6 of the same energy type to the target; uses/day = 1 + your Con bonus. The prerequisite property need not be active. A weapon can take this property multiple times (once per listed prerequisite); each activation triggers only one surge. Once you activate this property, no other creature can activate it until the next day.
rows.required_spells: Spell(s) corresponding to the chosen prerequisite property (corrosive/flaming/frost/shock)

rows.name: Enervating
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit vs a living creature, target gains 1 negative level; lost after 1 hour (no permanent drain).

rows.name: Ethereal Reaver
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as ghost touch. Also grants see invisibility to the wielder.

rows.name: Everbright
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command 2/day: all creatures within 20 ft are blinded for 1 round (Reflex DC 14 negates). Weapon is immune to acid damage and rusting effects.

rows.name: Fiercebane
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as bane vs the same designated creature type/subtype as the prerequisite. Glows when a designated foe is within 60 ft. On a critical hit vs its designated foe, deals extra damage by crit multiplier: x2 +1d10; x3 +2d10; x4 +3d10. Projectile weapons bestow this on ammunition.

rows.name: Fleshgrinding
rows.stacking_rules: Free command when you damage a living creature: release the weapon; for 5 rounds at the start of your turns it deals automatic damage as a normal hit (includes enhancement, properties, and your Str bonus; excludes feat-based extra damage). Anyone other than you can pull it free with a standard action and DC 20 Str check. After duration it returns to your hand (as returning) unless held by the target.

rows.name: Force
rows.stacking_rules: Ammunition becomes a force attack: automatically overcomes DR, ignores incorporeal miss chance, but doesn’t affect creatures immune to force. Damage as normal for the ammunition.

rows.name: Ghost Strike
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as ghost touch. Sneak attacks and critical hits against undead apply as if they were living.

rows.name: Harmonizing
rows.stacking_rules: +2 competence bonus on Perform (sing). If you begin a bardic music effect while holding the weapon, starting 1 round later the weapon continues the performance for up to 10 rounds (or until you start another such effect or end it as a swift mental action).
rows.required_spells: ghost sound; requires bardic music class feature

rows.name: Heavenly Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit against an evil creature, deals +3d6 damage and blinds the target for 1 round (Fort DC 14 negates blindness). Projectile weapons pass this to ammunition.

rows.name: Hideaway
rows.stacking_rules: Swift command: folds into a bundle two size categories smaller; +2 bonus on Sleight of Hand to conceal while folded. Swift command to unfold.

rows.name: Holy Surge
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as holy. Additionally, on a successful melee hit you may command a burst that deals +3d6 damage to an evil target (no effect vs non-evil); uses/day = 1 + your Cha bonus. Once you activate this property, no other creature can activate it until the next day.

rows.name: Illuminating
rows.stacking_rules: When drawn, sheds bright light in a 20-ft radius and shadowy illumination for 20 ft beyond.

rows.name: Hunting
rows.stacking_rules: +4 bonus on weapon damage rolls against your favored enemies (ranger class feature).

rows.name: Ignan
rows.stacking_rules: Automatically overcomes DR of creatures with the water subtype; deals +2d6 damage vs such creatures. A creature with the water subtype that wields it gains 1 negative level while held (cannot be removed while wielded, no actual level loss). Projectile weapons pass this to ammunition.

rows.name: Illusion Bane
rows.stacking_rules: Attacks ignore miss chance from illusions (and similar effects such as displacement), though you must still target the correct square when total concealment applies. 1/day, swift command to dispel illusions: after hitting a creature make a dispel check (1d20+10) against each illusion on it; or touch an illusion (e.g., mirror image, silent image) to attempt the check and dispel the whole effect on success.

rows.name: Illusion Theft
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as illusion bane. The first illusion spell dispelled by the weapon is stored (as per spell storing, but only illusions and not limited to 3rd level; cannot be cast into the weapon). You may later activate to apply the stored illusion to a chosen target; its paused duration resumes upon activation. After discharge, a new dispelled illusion must be stored before this can be used again.

rows.name: Impact
rows.stacking_rules: Doubles the weapon’s threat range. Does not stack with other threat-range expansion effects.

rows.name: Impaling
rows.stacking_rules: 3/day, swift command to make the weapon’s next attack (this turn) a touch attack; must declare before rolling; use is wasted on a miss.

rows.name: Impedance
rows.stacking_rules: On a hit, target’s spells and SLAs are impeded for 1d6 rounds. To cast/use, target must succeed on a check (Spellcraft, Int, or Cha—highest bonus) DC 15 + spell level; on failure the effect is lost.

rows.name: Implacable
rows.stacking_rules: On damaging a living creature, causes bleeding for 5 rounds: target takes 2 damage at the start of each of your turns; multiple wounds stack. Bleeding stops with a DC 15 Heal check or any healing; while bleeding, curative spells require a DC 15 caster level check to affect the target. Counts as adamantine for overcoming the DR of aberrations.

rows.name: Incorporeal Binding
rows.stacking_rules: Functions as ghost touch. When it damages an incorporeal creature, for 1 round the target loses its 50% incorporeal miss chance and its 50% chance to ignore spells; all other incorporeal benefits remain.

rows.name: Knockback
rows.stacking_rules: 3/day, swift command: the next hit before end of your turn forces the target (of your size or smaller) to make a Fort DC 19 save or be pushed back 5 ft (no effect if it can’t move back).

rows.name: Lucky
rows.stacking_rules: Once per day, free mental activation to reroll a single failed attack roll.
rows.required_spells: moment of prescience or fate of one (EPH 107)

rows.name: Magebane
rows.stacking_rules: Against creatures that can cast arcane spells or use invocations, the weapon’s enhancement bonus is +2 higher and it deals +2d6 damage. May be added to cold iron without the usual +2,000 gp surcharge. Projectile weapons pass this to ammunition.

rows.name: Maiming
rows.stacking_rules: On crit, extra damage by multiplier (x2:1d6; x3:2d6; x4:3d6).

rows.name: Manifester
rows.stacking_rules: 1/day draw 5 PP for a single targeted power; those PP must all be used on that one power and cannot be combined with PP from other sources.

rows.name: Metalline
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to shift composition among adamantine, alchemical silver, cold iron, or steel.

rows.name: Mighty Smiting
rows.stacking_rules: +2 attack and damage on smite; wielder gains 1 extra daily use of one smite ability while wielding (weapon grants only one extra use total per day).

rows.name: Mindcrusher
rows.stacking_rules: On hit vs psionic creatures, target loses PP equal to half base weapon damage dealt; non-psionic targets must succeed on Will DC 17 or take 1 Wis damage. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Mindfeeder
rows.stacking_rules: On crit, wielder gains 1 temporary PP per 5 damage (lasts up to 1 minute; overlaps, does not stack). Does not trigger on creatures immune to crits. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Morphing
rows.stacking_rules: Standard action to reshape into any other melee/thrown weapon of same size and type (light/one-handed/two-handed). Double-weapon handling as described.

rows.name: Necrotic Focus
rows.stacking_rules: Channels ability drain/energy drain through the weapon as if natural attacks; if a save is allowed, add the weapon’s enhancement bonus to the DC.

rows.name: Paralytic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On crit, target is paralyzed for 1 round (Will DC 17 negates). Triggers even if target is normally immune to extra crit damage.

rows.name: Paralyzing
rows.stacking_rules: Swift activate; next struck target Will DC 17 or paralyzed up to 10 rounds (new save each round). 1/day.

rows.name: Parrying
rows.stacking_rules: When held, grants +1 insight bonus to AC and +1 insight bonus on saves (works even if flat-footed).

rows.name: Power Storing
rows.stacking_rules: Stores one targeted power of up to 5 PP; on hit may manifest it on the target; 50% chance to be found preloaded. Telepathically communicates the stored power.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; manifester level 12th

rows.name: Precise
rows.stacking_rules: Ignore the normal –4 penalty for shooting/throwing into melee (no benefit if you already have Precise Shot).
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Precise Shot

rows.name: Prismatic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On crit, target is affected as by prismatic spray (DC 20). Triggers even if target is normally immune to extra crit damage.

rows.name: Profane
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command to sheathe in negative energy; living wielders take 1 Con damage/round while active (undead unaffected). While active: +1d6 damage vs living (2d6 vs good outsiders) and counts as evil-aligned. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Profane Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires Profane. On crit, extra negative energy damage (x2:1d10; x3:2d10; x4:3d10), doubled vs good outsiders. Burst applies even if Profane isn’t active. Non-undead wielder takes 1d4 Con damage (or Cha if no Con). Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Psibane
rows.stacking_rules: Against psionic subtype: enhancement bonus counts as +2 higher and deals +2d6 damage. Any psionic creature wielding it gains one negative level while held. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.

rows.name: Psychokinetic
rows.stacking_rules: Standard command; on hit deals +1d4 force damage. Not reduced by DR; affects incorporeal targets despite miss chance. Projectile weapons pass to ammo.
rows.required_spells: blast of force (SC 31) or concussive blast (EPH 85)

rows.name: Psychokinetic Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy version of psychokinetic; on crit deals extra force damage by crit multiplier (1d6/2d6/3d6). Extra damage ignores DR and hits incorporeal (no miss chance). Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.
rows.required_spells: blast of force or concussive blast

rows.name: Quick Loading
rows.stacking_rules: Crossbow gains extradimensional magazine (up to 100 bolts). Reload hand/light: free action; heavy: move action. Manually adding/removing a bolt to the space is a move (manipulation) action.

rows.name: Resounding
rows.stacking_rules: On hit, allies (incl. wielder) within 30 ft. gain +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs. fear for 1 round.

rows.name: Revealing
rows.stacking_rules: On hit, target is outlined as faerie fire for 1 round.

rows.name: Sacred
rows.stacking_rules: Standard (command) to sheathe in positive energy; deals +1d6 vs undead or +2d6 vs evil outsiders; counts as good-aligned. If wielder is undead, takes 1 Cha damage/round while active. Projectiles pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Sacred Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy with sacred; on crit deals extra positive energy (x2:1d10, x3:2d10, x4:3d10; double vs evil outsiders). If wielder is undead, takes 1d4 Cha damage on the burst. Continuous; projectiles pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Screaming
rows.stacking_rules: Standard (command) to activate; on hit deals +1d4 sonic damage. Negated in magical silence. Projectiles pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Screaming Burst
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy with screaming; on crit deals extra sonic damage (x2:1d8, x3:2d8, x4:3d8). Continuous; projectiles pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Shadowstrike
rows.stacking_rules: Swift (mental) 1/day: increase reach by 5 ft for a single attack; target is denied Dex bonus to AC.

rows.name: Shattermantle
rows.stacking_rules: On hit vs foe with SR, reduces SR by 2 for 1 round; multiple hits in same round stack.

rows.name: Shielding
rows.stacking_rules: Swift (command): transforms into a heavy steel shield with same enhancement bonus (to AC and shield bash). Commonly used off-hand.

rows.name: Sizing
rows.stacking_rules: Swift (command): change weapon to any size category you desire.

rows.name: Slow Burst
rows.stacking_rules: On crit, target is slowed for 3 rounds (Will DC 14 negates). Works even on creatures normally immune to crit extra damage; this adds a condition instead.

rows.name: Soulbound
rows.stacking_rules: Swift (mental). Invest essentia to increase enhancement on attack/damage by +1 per point (max +3). Essentia capacity 2. Chakra binds: Arms (+2 confirm crit), Brow (re-roll concealment miss chance once/round), Hands (+2 insight to initiative while held). Requires essentia pool 2.

rows.name: Spellstrike
rows.stacking_rules: As a free action, reallocate the weapon’s enhancement bonus to saving throws vs spells/spell-like abilities until your next turn.

rows.name: Stunning Surge
rows.stacking_rules: On a successful melee hit, (swift) force Fort save DC 10 + 1/2 level + Cha mod or target is stunned 1 round; uses/day = 1 + Cha bonus.

rows.name: Stygian
rows.stacking_rules: (Swift) next hit bestows 1 negative level (10 minutes); 3/day.

rows.name: Sundering
rows.stacking_rules: Attack as if you have Improved Sunder; +1d6 damage on sunder attempts.
rows.required_feat: Craft Magic Arms and Armor; Improved Sunder
rows.required_spells: weapon of impact (SC 237) or metaphysical weapon (EPH 118)

rows.name: Sweeping
rows.stacking_rules: +2 competence bonus on Strength checks to trip with the weapon.

rows.name: Terran
rows.stacking_rules: Bypasses DR of creatures with the air subtype; deals +2d6 damage vs such creatures; imposes one negative level on air-subtype wielders while held. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Transmuting
rows.stacking_rules: After hitting a creature with DR, at start of your next turn the weapon adapts to bypass that DR for 10 rounds (or until it adapts to a different target’s DR). Gains no other benefits of the materials.

rows.name: Vampiric
rows.stacking_rules: +1d6 damage vs living; wielder heals HP equal to extra damage dealt.

rows.name: Vanishing
rows.stacking_rules: 1/day after a successful melee attack, (swift) teleport self and gear up to 60 ft as per dimension door limitations.

rows.name: Venomous
rows.stacking_rules: (Swift) coat with injury poison (Fort DC 14, 1d4 Str/1d4 Str) for 1 minute or until next hit; 3/day. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Warning
rows.stacking_rules: +5 insight bonus on initiative checks while held.

rows.name: Weakening
rows.stacking_rules: On a critical hit target takes –4 Strength for 10 minutes (min 1); not cumulative. Projectile weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Whirling
rows.stacking_rules: 3/day as a full-round action, make one melee attack at full bonus against each foe within reach (as Whirlwind Attack).

rows.name: Corrosive
rows.stacking_rules: Toggle; on-hit +1d6 acid. Ranged weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Corrosive
rows.stacking_rules: Toggle; on-hit +1d6 acid. Ranged weapons pass to ammunition.

rows.name: Acidic burst
rows.stacking_rules: As corrosive plus extra acid on critical hit.

rows.name: Acidic burst
rows.stacking_rules: As corrosive plus extra acid on critical hit.

rows.name: Caustic surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; add +2d6 acid on that hit; uses/day keyed to Con modifier.

rows.name: Icy surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; add +2d6 cold; uses/day keyed to Cha modifier.

rows.name: Lightning surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; add +2d6 electricity; uses/day keyed to Cha modifier.

rows.name: Holy surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; add +2d6 damage vs evil only; uses/day keyed to Cha modifier.

rows.name: Unholy surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; add +2d6 damage vs good only; uses/day keyed to Cha modifier.

rows.name: Defensive surge
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; +2 AC while using Combat Expertise or fighting defensively; +4 AC while total defense; uses/day keyed to Cha modifier.

rows.name: Sudden stunning
rows.stacking_rules: Swift action after a successful melee attack; target Reflex DC = 10 + 1/2 wielder level + Cha mod; stunned 1d4+1 rounds on failed save.

rows.name: Illusion bane
rows.stacking_rules: 1/day ignore miss chance from illusions; may attempt to dispel illusion(s) on target (or by touch) with 1d20+10.

rows.name: Illusion bane
rows.stacking_rules: 1/day ignore miss chance from illusions; may attempt to dispel illusion(s) on target (or by touch) with 1d20+10.

rows.name: Illusion theft
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires Illusion bane. When you dispel an illusion via Illusion bane, you can store it for later use.

rows.name: Illusion theft
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires Illusion bane. When you dispel an illusion via Illusion bane, you can store it for later use.

rows.name: Incorporeal binding
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires ghost touch. On hit vs an incorporeal target, target loses incorporeal miss chance for 1 round.

rows.name: Incorporeal binding
rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires ghost touch. On hit vs an incorporeal target, target loses incorporeal miss chance for 1 round.

rows.stacking_rules: Synergy: requires shock or shocking burst. 1/day standard action to summon a air elemental for up to 11 rounds.
